intro: Hydrostachys hildebrandtii, commonly known as the Cape jasmine, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is a shrub that typically grows in coastal areas and sandy soils. The plant produces small, fragrant white flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are narrow and lance-shaped, and it has a woody stem. Hydrostachys hildebrandtii is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
